'''Araminali''' is an [[Aranara]] and [[NPC]] located south-east of [[Vanarana]], [[Sumeru]]. Located underground and rewards you with 8 Common Chests, 3 Exquisite Chests, 3 Precious Chests, and 1 Luxurious Chest as a reward for helping all 64 unnamed [[Aranara]] of [[Dharma Forest]]. Opening all chests rewards you with the [[For Meritorious Service]] achievement.
